verbs.description: [ARG0: idaho lawmakers] [V: crack] down [ARG1: on school threats the current law says the threat must be made on school grounds] [ARGM-ADV: if it made on social media in most cases nothing can be done lawmakers said this law is outdated social media school house bill law enforcement rep wendy horman john gannon footballer fraternal order of police rep patrick mcdonald boise idaho r idaho falls nampa police department]

idaho lawmakers crack down on school threats [ARG0: the current law] [V: says] [ARG1: the threat must be made on school grounds] if it made on social media in most cases nothing can be done lawmakers said this law is outdated social media school house bill law enforcement rep wendy horman john gannon footballer fraternal order of police rep patrick mcdonald boise idaho r idaho falls nampa police department
